name: Dragon's Bane
description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>20%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>28%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>32%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <cryo>36%</cryo>.
